lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're fucking doing this. Hello! Welcome to this evening's episode of Critical Role. I will be your DM for the evening. My name is Travis Willingham, and this is where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This feels sacrilege.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is all Grog's fault. Tonight's episode is brought to you by a wonderful sponsor, Marvel Puzzle Quest! Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In honor of Marvel Puzzle Quest sponsoring this episode, we actually had Grog write the advertising copy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember that, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck! You can download it at the Apple Store. I like apples! Google Play. I like to play! Or the Amazon app store. I like amazons. Or Steam! I don't like steam. It is angry water and it makes my face hurt. Also, ale. The end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did you do that without moving your mouth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a long online tutoring session that Sam paid a lot of money for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike wrote it down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounded just like him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My voice acting is good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right?! It's super good. Announcements! Do we have some merches?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you want to do this! Yeah, yours is out in the kitchen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is soft.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's soft and wonderful. We wanted this last year for Christmas or holidays, and then it didn't happen, so it's this year and it's beautiful and amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not one of those scritchy-scratchy scarves. It's soft.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's even what passes for cold out here in beautiful California.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it's not cold, you can hang it on your wall. It's a good banner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks so nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's beautiful and we love it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's gorgeous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could wear it with your Critical Role hat and be full-on-- oh my god, I want to see someone decked full.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be amazing. Wearing all the shirts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the shirts, and the hoodie, and the hat, and maybe the necklace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's on Twitter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we ever have socks? We have socks. I don't own the socks!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have so many extra pairs at home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was your pun! You were the one who demanded Socks Machina.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was the one who was supposed to pass them out, but then I didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Other announcements. Some of you will be attending PAX Unplugged in Philadelphia. Is that correct? Yes? Who?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: M & M, and you and I, Tal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, M & M and L & T.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not Marshall Mathers. We meant Matt and Marisha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt and Marisha. Yeah. It's November--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in two weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't remember the exact date--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The weekend of November 17th.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Patsies? I said Pats Unplugged, so I tried to play it off of Patsy. We will be in Australia. We'll be at Supanova.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the other L & T!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right! For two weeks in November, we'll be at Adelaide and Brisbane. So, if you're Down Under, come see us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How you feeling, baby?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can see this long-distance stare.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything else? What am I forgetting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Couple things. Next week, Marisha will be in your chair, running a game of Honey Heist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No idea what that is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all bears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Except Travis and I won't be there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all bears?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not bears, but the three of us and everyone else who's going to be here are going to be bears. It's the worst episode for you not to be here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! I'm missing the Honey Heist!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are excited to announce the Critical Role: Vox Machina wrap-up. Yes. It's the pearly gates Q&A session we've been talking about since day one. It will be a Talks Machina episode hosted by the illustrious and never-stinky Brian W. Foster. Live Thursday, December 14th, in the normal Critical Role time slot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's a Thursday.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll be discussing the entirety of the Vox Machina campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means we get to ask Matt all of the secrets, and he has to tell us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we can ask each other, too! I'm going to read that letter that I wrote to Pike! All kinds of shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the note that I have says, "Please keep an eye on various social medias as we will be "breaking up the question submissions into five story arcs." So more info to come on that. Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are a few other-- I don't know if they gave you the full page.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we all get to talk as Grog tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Grog voice) I think so, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can, but it might get you killed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, it's great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know what that number is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're also, some of us are going to be at BlizzCon tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can find us. There's a Geek and Sundry panel at 4:00 on the Epic stage at BlizzCon. I have this in my head. Now that I don't have a game in my head, all of this new information has flooded through. Also, Phil LaMarr is coming onto the Wednesday Club next week to talk Thor and his hammer. It's going to be fun. I was asked to inform everyone that there's going to be no Gather Your Party, because BlizzCon, so instead it's going to be Tales from the Loop with Amy Dallen, Vorpahl, Sax, Rachel, Gina, and Kelly Del Angelo is going to be GMing, and it's going to be nuts. That'll be Friday while we're partying at BlizzCon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I say one more? What? It was just announced that I joined the cast of Last of Us 2!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at these guns!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone, do your Laura Bailey impression!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check out that trailer if you feel like feeling shaky and, yeah. It's pretty brutal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She plays the car that's on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feel-good game of the year.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm very excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you even know she was in the game?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In what game?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all NDAs, you know. We're not allowed to share it with anybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No duh! Also, tomorrow will be the first character playlist. It will be mine, so you can find it sometime tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, I never did mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got time!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't do it. I barely did this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It'll drop sometime tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything else? Is that it? Okay. I guess if we have no other distractions--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Madness! Yeah, episode two dropped on Project Alpha today. It's pretty great, it's pretty spooky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to point out that Keyleth's dice just rolled a one. No, I don't have my dice jail with me. But I rolled an 18 on my own personal dice. I rolled the best. No, Matt's roll was a natural 20. So those ones stay out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that. I expected a little bit more. We start this game as you guys playing your characters. Grog has asked all of his members, all of his fellow warriors in Vox Machina, to join him in Scanlan's Magnificent Mansion for a game that he has heard about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're turning into Grog right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Yeah. Oh my god! Guys, you're all here! Oh, thank god. Did anyone have the salad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yes, they just whipped up a fresh batch of tzatziki sauce to go with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chicken, did anybody have the chicken instead of the salad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No chicken. There's no more chicken, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was making sure it wasn't me. Hey, look, I know we've got a night to ourselves. I was wondering if maybe we could all, like, play a game I heard about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, should I go wake up the others?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. I don't think so. It's a little above their head. Yeah, it's only for us big thinkers. Okay. Yeah. So, I was in this tavern the other day, right? And I heard about this game. I think it's called Bunions and Flagons, right. And you are all going to play as little, itty-bitty versions of yourselves. All you got to do is use your imagination. Right? I'm going to tell you a story and then you contribute, tell me what you want to do, and I draw out little maps, and we'll go on an adventure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're, like, baby versions of ourselves?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's like, the size of your thumb, like tiny. We're going to move them around. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like Tiny Vax, but tiny everybody, this time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, I'm already tiny. Even tinier?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll be the size of a pinky, maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you know, you're tiny, but you've got a big, uh, heart. What do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It sounds great. I mean, this is so unlike you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, you know, I've been thinking about it for a long time. I actually made art for each of you guys, so like, I made Percy, right, and then I made Vex. Right, with the ears and the arrows. And then there's Vax'ildan, with his little ears bleeding. Then the Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That looks just like you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The eyes are haunting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's drawn to scale, that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's amazing! Wait, did you draw Grog? I guess you're not playing with us? How does this work?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. No, I am playing with you. I'll be there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a ball involved in this game? A ball? Games are typically-- ball, a ball.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a bowl, but a ball. Not a bowl you eat out of, but a ball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not that my father ever played catch with me, but you know, the type of ball that one would play catch with, with one's father, if they gave a shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no ball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of game is it, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to put everything on this big table in front of us. It'll be right in front of you, and you get to sit in your chair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like cards, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can your servants bring over some liquor? Because I think we're going to need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep the wine coming!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, always a good idea, when playing this game, to drink heavily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vegan wine, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, all right, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should warn you, I'm a power gamer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Power gamer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know, I get really into it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In your brain theaters, all right, I want you to imagine that Vox Machina has been successful on its latest mission. We are triumphant!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As always.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Small, maybe off the beaten path, right. It's shambly outside. We go in and it's deserted, right? There's only like one other couple in the whole fucking place. We got the run of the lot. We go in. It's time to drink. We're raising glasses, we're cheering, we're drinking. Everybody's boozing, right? Yeah! Who wants to make a toast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the game?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) Right then! My character has a different accent than Scanlan does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're just playing you, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I know, but I want to get into it, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right then, we did a really good job in the fight today! So I think that we should all propose a toast to the one that fell. Keyleth. I'm sorry she'll never be joining us again. To Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's an odd story choice to make.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cheers, yeah. To Keyleth. Underpowered her whole life, really. Nothing at her disposal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May her memory live forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we are drinking, and we're on, like-- What's a big number? Our second cup. Everybody's really starting to feel it a little bit, especially our little gnome, Pike. Pike gets up on the table, right. She's like-- Pike! Flower! My friend. Pike gets up and she's like, "You guys, I "love being your friend."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too real.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dimensional distortion there for a second!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm really, like, all of your friend! You are good!" And she turns to you, Vex, yeah, and she's like, "You know, we're so close! And you know, I--" (gulping) And you start to see, right, that maybe she's had one too many, which is really saying something for that little tank. She goes, "Ah, nope. I got it-- urp!" And in that moment you start to see all the color come up to her face. I need you to roll a dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean? What's a dexterity check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, I heard a guy at the bar say it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to roll one of these fancy gems that I have. All right. Oh, that's really good! Oh wait, just a check? 11 plus-- 18. No, 29! That means it's 29.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know what to add?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really smart! I'm very smart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally, right. So, 29, that's great! At the last moment you see what is bound to be a shoot of vomit in your face and you just, boop! Duck out of the way. She catches it with her lips and this little stream of bile comes, like, shooting out and goes over your shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to grab a glass and try to catch it in a mug. So it doesn't get all over the floor, you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You raise the glass right in front of her face. As she sees it, she sees more alcohol in the glass, and she goes, "Mm!" and turns away, and paints the bar. Except that other couple that was in the bar with you, they're right in the path of her destruction. Yeah. And she Alphabits and Lucky Charms all over the place. All over the table on this couple. You see, as this gentleman, this greenish-skinned with large lower teeth and a hood and a cloak, stands up and starts to turn toward you. He's like, "What the fuck?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Yeah. Is she with you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm sure you guys are going to take care of this, right? I mean, it's in my drink, "it's on my food, it's on my--" And you see with him is also this very lovely lady. She's got slightly bluish skin and she is also, like, staring in revulsion at all of this mess that she's wearing. Right? It's on her. Maybe there's a little bit hanging off of her lip. She starts to go, "Wha-- (gulping) what--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no! I hold the cup under her mouth as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She holds it in, but this really infuriates this half-orc looking gentleman. He stands up, right? and he's like, "That's it. You and I-- You! You and I, we're coming to blows. I "want answers for this."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just standing here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Nope, I've stood up! I'm making a point that doesn't make any difference, and I'm too "embarrassed to back down now."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but wait one second. Grog, you're very good at this. Have you been spending time at the theater and not telling us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's a theater?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's fight this fucking guy! What do I do? Do I actually use this, or what do I do? Are we fighting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, imagination weapons. Yeah. You tell me what you want to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to poke him in the eyes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Okay. So, you, yeah! Take one of those big, globular, like, d20 dices.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to use this weird--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The mansion provides.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use this weird purple one, where you can't read the numbers on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it says 13. And what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The servants bring over a sheet that has modifiers for you to use. Yeah. These are things you add.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you add to it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I'm improvising this weapon, is that accurate? All right, so I would add, I have no fucking idea. You know what I'm going to do? I'm going to add my wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why wisdom? No, it's strength!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why would I add anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's pretty wise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15? That's all you need. You, boink, right in his eyes, and he's like, "Argh! In the eyes!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fucking hilarious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. The girl stands up at the table and she's like, "No! No, please! Not his eyes!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have four of these.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, and she sees you standing there, ready to go, and she's like, "No, please, please!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You threaten me all the time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but she doesn't have any weapons on her!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Neither do I!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, do you want to see if she has any weapons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well I'm very perceptive, Grog. You know that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you are perceptive. Right. Roll a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This game thinks of everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's just unfortunate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, 31 is higher than 15. 31's really high. It's high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so you see her genealogy going back, like, four generations.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you even know what genealogy is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. So you see at her side this spear that's laying up against the table. Yeah, yeah. I don't know how you missed it the first time. It's a fucking spear, right there. She stands up and she's like, "No, no, please! No more eye-poking!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, Grog! I'm going to try to turn invisible, if that's all right. Can I just do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. Can you just do that, or do you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I normally just do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Go invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to go invisible and I'm going to try to swipe the spear before she gets to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Seven, plus-- ten. So, it's ten. This many.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten total? Okay, great. So you go invisible, right, and you walk over behind the blue-skinned lady and right as you get to the spear, you grab for it, but there's something that catches your eye and you fumble the spear and it falls to the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shite, I dropped the spear!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good, I love it. As she hears the spear fall, she turns and she swings her hand wildly, catching you dead in the face. Boom! Knocks you back. You fly back onto your back five feet. You take two points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're intelligent. Do you understand what is happening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not in the least. None of this makes any sense. These numbers seem completely arbitrary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's so good at this, though! I feel like we should keep supporting this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we're in a tavern right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he might have eaten something in the back. This is not normal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's never been good at anything intellectual and now this is it! So maybe we should support him and go with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, the reason that you fumbled for the spear is that you saw this small little bundle next to her chair. In fact, it looks like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a baby?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like a small baby, all swaddled up in cloth. No, small.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the baby also covered in vomit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I have a question. Are we teeny at this moment, or are we normal sized?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, yeah, I'm going to put this out like, what's that game where you move the--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Parcheesi? Checkers? Chess?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that one! We'll be like that on a big map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really quickly into my earring, I say: She's got a baby with her!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Are we going to fight a baby now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, just thought you might like to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you're not that far from her, so she goes, "It is a baby, it is! Please, we just want "to leave, I'm sorry if we caused you any trouble!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it really look like a baby?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you want to go over to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to go over and look at the baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, walk on over and make a perception check. It's a baby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I know I keep slowing things down here, but in this imagination game, can we do anything that we do in life?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good question. Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we do things that we can't do in life?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That sent a shiver down my spine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then I'll let you know how it goes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to cast Faerie Fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes I do. I had the craziest dream last night, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That you became part druid?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. And then I died, and then I wasn't here, and then I was. And then there was like, three weeks where I was a father in this other city, washing dishes, and I had this "car." There were no horses but it was just wind. I had these kids. I don't know who these kids were.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we have warned you about eating cheese before bed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The moldy cheese. The point of this is, there's a small baby, right, and you've got a couple covered in puke, and she's asking if maybe they can leave instead of-- avoid further scrum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I fink we should let them leave! I "fink?" I'm listening to Grog too much!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to save that for later. I'm going to put these away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try to enjoy the rest of your night." He goes over and gets his blue-skinned wife up, and she grabs her little bundle, and they start to make their way out of the tavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab the spear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. They didn't take it, so I will take it now. It's my spear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I read their lips on the way out? Are they talking? Can I read their lips?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are they saying?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll a d20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody seems to know what's going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I adding anything to it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perception. Do a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just "yes, and," Vax. Yes, and.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24. That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa. So you see that she's actually going like, "That was so embarrassing. I want to go home "and take my clothes off and you and I go and we'll have a great night."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I think they really want to go bone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, lots of boning in their future.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wish to examine the spear. Is it a special spear? Is it an interesting spear? Does it do anything? Does it require batteries?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog goes over to Pike and goes, "Okay, Pikey-poo, maybe it's time to, let's put you to sleep "upstairs. Barkeep!" And you look behind the tavern, and there is a-- fuck, in your mind, he's fucking over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a muscle reaction, it's inevitable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He might be over there in a second. Stay with me. So Grog picks up Pike and goes over to the barkeep and he's like, "Do you have any rooms that I can put this little gnome in?" And he's like, "Yes, I have, I do! Have rooms!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good voice, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (wheezing) "How much money do you have?" And Grog's like, "I have ten gold." And he's like, "Sure, that'll fucking do it!" So Grog goes and takes Pike upstairs, puts her in a room, comes back down. And like, "Whoa, she is hammered."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten gold for a room, Grog, is a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if you know, but I'm super rich because I never really buy anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do buy some things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I always seem to find the money. That's what I do. Find the money. So now, it turns out that your cups are all slightly emptier than before. Your plates are rather empty. It doesn't really seem like we want the night to end. Does somebody want to maybe check with the barkeep and see if he has any more?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog-- not Grog, but Grog-- did we get any points?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Points?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He does not understand this game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right. Oh! Like, did we do something right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we win?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Actually, like, at the end of this story, you either win or lose, like, overall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, are you going to judge us? Does one of us win more than other people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you not take any drama classes as a child?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to win so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you like the theater?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love the theater. But we're playing a game!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Preferably three to four hours long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a long game, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought we were near the end of the game, but we're just getting started?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we're just kicking this shit off. Get comfy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're going to be here for a while, Grog, can I have some of my invisible servants come in and lightly play a light accompaniment music? Play some strings or flutes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Set the tone, the mood? Totally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh there it is, it's nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on, can you ask them to bring in some, like, meats? Like a meat and cheese plate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I actually can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Kaylie won't fucking know, please! I'm so tired of this green shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will know. She'll be able to read it on my face. She can see all of my lies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a game! It's make-believe!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, if it's make-believe, then, here you go! Here are your meats for you, right there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, you got to stay in the game. That's only in the game with that stuff. So you're in the tavern. You need more to drink. Who wants to go talk to the barkeep?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go talk to the barkeep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another round for everyone. Your finest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Eh?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouting) Another round for everyone! Your finest!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Oh yes, yeah, oh! To drink, or to eat?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To drink! Another round of drinks! For everyone!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ask him his name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would I do--? Your finest! What's your name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We want to get fucked up!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do I care about his name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I want to hear what Grog comes up with!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But his name is Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "My name? It's Bob!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'll admit, that is quite charming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Bobaline is my full name, but people call me Bob!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bobaline, I feel, really, is quite appropriate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "It's a family name. If you want more to drink, unfortunately, I was not planning on you "being here. It's quite late. I do, however, have more food in the pantry below the bar. Or, there "are some extra casks of ale out with the pigs."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't understand how a bar runs out of alcohol after one round for five of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not run out, he said he has more downstairs, or there's some outside in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should go down to the cellar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bobaline, are you going to go down and get it and bring it up, or are you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "No, unfortunately, me son is the one who normally goes and gets it. He's not here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your son's name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Timothy!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I should write that down to make sure that you don't forget it or screw it up later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We, as a group, must make this choice together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's creepy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Well, it's not a huge deal, I just need one of you to either go down and get the food, "and one of you to go get the ale."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You and I will go down to the cellar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Yeah, you go down to the cellar, and Grog-- I will go get the ale, unless somebody "wants to go out in the pig sty. I'll go."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will go with you, Grog, to the pig sty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Or do you two want to go get the ale?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I volunteer to go to the sty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool. So you, Vax, and Sam, you make your way out back. Scanlan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to the basement, because once, in Syngorn, a comic book shop owner tried to get me to go to the basement to look at comic books, and I'm not doing that. Yeah. So good luck in the cellar. Let's go see the pigs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As Vax and Scanlan start to head toward the back door, Vex and Percy, would you like to try and find the latch under the bar that leads--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we would.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job. Right, so you lift the latch in the floor and you go down. It's a very small room that has different salted meats and cheeses, and some bread and stuff like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This cellar has better food than your mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We take it all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take armfuls?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: After a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, do you want to see maybe what else is down there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's see what else is down there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll perception checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is good. 28.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. You also see three of these bottles with hided, belted locks on it, and it says "sandkheg" on there. It looks really, really expensive. There's three bottles of that. Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to pick the lock so I can get them. Can I do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. What do you roll to pick a lock?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know whether to shit or go blind in this game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I roll to pick a lock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax has no idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about Liam? What does Liam know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you have to know how locks work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd think it's dexterity or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dex proficiency, for god's sake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are those words you're using?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were you never in school? Have you never done this before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't pay attention through any of school. I copied everything that she wrote down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I remember this game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After trying to break the lock, or pick it, you get the lockpick stuck in there. Yeah, and it's all fucked up. But you're really resilient and you smash the top of the bottle. It seems stupid to have a lock on a glass bottle, but it works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to smash the bottle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did it already. It's too bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is all the drink spilling out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! You just smashed the top off. You have the rest of the bottle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, okay. That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should try it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got some salted meats, some cheese.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And this bottle of fanciness. We have to drink it all because we can't close it back up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's all dusty shelves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shelves!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see anything else, Percy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a leathery book on one of the shelves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a leathery book?! I'm taking the leathery book, my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to open it up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Books have titles on covers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they do. It says "Ledger."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It says "Ledger." I'm going to open up the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he opens it, I'm going to take a sip of this fancy wine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, yeah. Roll a constitution check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've really caught onto this game quickly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13. Right. You take a sip, and boy does it burn. You're like (gagging). You feel like you could breathe fire. It starts to spread down into your chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it make me breathe fire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, not literal fire, like (gasps) fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, why are you making a Keyleth face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This-- what is it called?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sandkheg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This sandkheg is really strong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I've got to try this really quickly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take a sip. Sip. Sip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to be very careful because it's jagged on the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, you have to be very careful because there's broken glass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll a constitution check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of role playing are we doing here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The best kind. No. I rolled a four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so the warmth starts to spread, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You also feel this immediate desire to upchuck the liquid because it's so strong. In your rush to cover your mouth, you drop the bottle and it shatters all over the floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we hear it upstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We speak of this never again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ever. Nobody knows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should open the book, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's open this ledger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You open the book, and it's got numbers in it with letters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they in a particular order?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Using my deftness of wit, can I start to put together some meaning to the numbers and words within this ledger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unfortunately, no, it's beyond your mental prowess. So, back upstairs!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of the food. We're carrying meat and cheese and all of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all want to stay in the pantry or come back up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you stayed down there for a while?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we came back up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Vax and Scanlan, y'all head out back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're getting ale for our buddy, Grog. Got to keep the big man hydrated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, we have to. He'll know if we don't get him some, so let's go sneaky back there to make sure there's no monsters hiding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know how to sneak with dice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We tell our Bunion Master that we're going out there to sneak around and then he'll make it happen for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Night at the Improv, here we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Use your imagination.You get to the back door and you push it open. You see before you, right, a pen full of muck, mud and these three large hogs rolling around in the muck. Off to the side, you see a large cask of ale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Neither one of us are very strong, can you do your handy thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To pick it up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't want to get all muddy and shit, could you just grab it from here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure I could, but shouldn't we try to lift it first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It seems to plebeian, don't you want to skip the hard work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, right, this is all make-'em-up. It doesn't matter, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure! I can make a purple hand! Can I make a purple hand? Why not? I thought it was imagination?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's not what you do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're imagining wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is my fun wrong?! I guess it is! All right, well, show me how to handle a pig.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm picking up a pig?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am. I am still technically here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, actually, you're not there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so confused!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy and Vex have made their way back to the table. You two are--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we're right at the table!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the table in the tavern. You two are at the back hall room there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we're trying to move a pig?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, a cask!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what I thought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't tell them, you're not there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I got confused for a second because this is confusing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's normally

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to grab the booze and carry it back with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! I'd like to cast Bigby's Hand and lift the cask.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't forget the pig.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. It's simple enough. So Bigby's Hand just appears around the cask and it wraps its purple fingers around the cask, picks it up, and holds it in mid-air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Come with me, O hand that holds the cask of our dreams.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Flavor. That's some good color. You guys should really step up your fucking game. Leave it to the bard, but yeah. Nice job. You get 300 XP for that performance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got points!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did he get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I got 300 points. I'm winning!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You remember being in school and they gave out gold stars when you did good things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was daydreaming, but I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm starting to take notes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you said there were no points and you got points?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, they're not points. They're XP.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that stand for, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Xylophone Players.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 300 Xylophone Players. My god, you could retire on that! In fact, you could retire quite well on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a fancy word!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you get the cask and you draw it back over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's no mystery that Grog likes you better than he likes me, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! Let Grog tell a story!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you bring the cask back to the table?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I float it back in and I present it in front of the barkeep and say, Bob!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your cask awaits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "You did a really great job. You guys are good. Good. Please, I'll give 70 percent off, "because shit, no one's here, so nobody will know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great! That's wonderful. Thank you, Bob.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "So please take, enjoy. It's just you." So you take the cask and the food back over. You two look a little disheveled, like you may have fallen down some stairs, going into the pantry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may have happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to make a toast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This would be a good opportunity for you all to get some XP.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This sucks. I'm really shitty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: And to Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's so strong and brave and very smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Extremely intelligent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And to all of this meat that we get to eat!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Cheers!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody drink to that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you actually call it, the purple hand? What'd you call that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I call it Bigby's Hand!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm asking you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I call it Bigby's Hand because a man named Bigby invented it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's supposed to be us. It's a concept.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know anything about this Bigby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was assuming it was actually his hand you were manifesting, like he was a large purple--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I learned it from another bard a long time ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did he play?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was his name Bigby?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a he. He was actually a stand-up comedian. That was his thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, so it was an applause hand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As the alcohol starts to go down the throats into the belly, down into your belly, the world starts to get a little hazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Did we just drink poison?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Did this stupid Bobaline poison us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a 150 XP for saying it. Also, you feel a lot of warmth in your face and you feel almost as if the world's been tilted on you. Like someone's pushing you around and you don't have much control. You reach out to steady yourself and to warn your other friends, when all of a sudden, the lights go out and you feel gravity take over and you just fall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Timothy, is that you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And fall, and fall. The end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, that's it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's not the end!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we were just having fun!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) You come to! (normal voice) Sorry, Chris. You come to and you're lying on the floor. It's cold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we feel drunk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we feel hungover?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. It's cold. It feels like stone underneath you. It's moist and damp. There's dirt everywhere and it feels uneven. You open your eyes and the light of the tavern is not the same as it was before. In fact, you're on a wood floor and you remember, but now there's stones beneath you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have all our shit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All there, but the environment has changed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any light?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is light. You look around and there seem to be along these stone walls around you, random torches. So there is some torchlight down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He really paints a vivid picture.

lines.name: LAURA
