lines.text: Is that how it works?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he is going to use Horrifying Visage on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A wisdom saving throw? Okay, so I don't have any of that. Oh, that's good. I rolled an 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Well, I'm going to back up and take a shot at this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back away from the ghost, or towards him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll just take one, since it seems we're being sporting about it. So I'm going to use my magical psychic shot. And that's not bad. That's a 24.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Well then, I'm going to do that, plus this. And I'm also going to hit him with a bit of electricity, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, that's lovely. That's ten points of damage, plus six points of psychic damage, plus four points of electricity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Calm retakes the hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back towards the tip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, musicians, calm down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's refocus on the shaft.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peruse the rest of the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make a perception check to explore the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just the tip, though, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I get too close to the tip, I might experience a burning sensation from the torch. 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20, yeah, that's great. You move forward, and you see no doorways, no exits, but you do see a line near the end of the hallway that seems to be a bit of an inequality in the rocks. Almost like if you push on it, something might happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should push on it, Percy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should backtrack the way we came.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really? All right, I'm pushing on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me a strength check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, this will go well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Push it real good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the lowest number you can get on that thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is indeed the lowest number you can get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you fall flat on your face, and you bite a bit of your tongue and lip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (lisping) I could use some assistance with this. Please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan, in real life, is not a very strong person, but I'm playing my character as very strong, so Scanlan runs in and pushes hard on the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, yeah, make a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16. You lean in and you push, having Percy, just like little bloody mouth right next to you, and sure enough, the wall starts to move, but you can see light coming from the other side. It's just too heavy for you to move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need some help over here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, he has to cross the thingy again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's going to have to cross the thingy again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, rock falls out of the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just like life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Something off in the distance, but you're still in the doorway. What do you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lit cabin?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Cavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shoot another oracle arrow into the lit cavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have another oracle arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, I have one more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah? Roll to attack. Shoot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You nock, and you pull, and you release, and your vision goes into the arrow, and it shoots forward. You see stone floors beneath you, and all of a sudden, it shoots past what looks like a flowing fountain of water, and it just arcs past, and you see as it clears past the fountain, a small, furry shape on the ground, and it hits into a ground, and it scatters, and the arrow shatters on the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a furry shape! There's an animal in there. Let's go in! I walk into the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. So. Would you all like to follow her? You all want to go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to hang back at the tip of the wang there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax hangs back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we all fell over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all fell over. There you go. So you see this fountain right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus H. That's lovely, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan right here, and Vax over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I don't want to leave. I don't want to go. I feel safe in the shaft.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where was the furry creature?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was past the fountain somewhere, you're not sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look at the ground and see if there's any traps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Traps? Do a perception check. Is that what you're doing for traps?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's investigation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, do roll an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12. There do not appear to be any traps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. Then I walk forward towards the fountain. And past it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will stick with her. So I can protect her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not doing the voice anymore?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's only when I in-character talk to someone else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, so this is the narrative. The narrative voice is different.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A tiny little dog. Where is the dog? Where's the dog gone? Right about here, at the edge of your vision.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the dog over there? By Bigby's Hand?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want this to be a dog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here's the dog right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you buy a dog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was in the box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a die on the map.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see a dog, his tail just sweeping behind him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, can I cast Speak With Animals?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to. And I want to talk to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to say: Hey, dog. What are you doing down here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is this massive thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some sort of demon dog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. I immediately shoot an arrow at him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I want to Hunter's Mark him first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll to attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't she have to step back to shoot an arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not right on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're at disadvantage if you're right up against.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm not right up against him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, ask the Bunion Master.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I just feel like that's a rule.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're at disadvantage because you're so close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Grog. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking dick, Scanlan. Fine. 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26. You hit the vicious hell hound. What's your damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Must be like a rottweiler or something then because they're so mean. Not really. That's just a myth, isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's just a myth. Although I had a neighbor with a chihuahua once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe a chihuahua. It's probably a chihuahua.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're all bite-y.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 16 plus six is 22 plus six is 28.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing. Great. Is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want Trinket to run up and attack him too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He does, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trinket runs up around the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh he got a natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That means something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you can't tell from her exuberance, a natural 20 is like the best thing you can roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you played this with him before you played with us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I happened to be in the same tavern that he was in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we all were Vax. Sorry, we didn't want to tell you but we were all there, that's why we know how to play the game so well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why didn't you let me sleep in with Keyleth then? Why am I here? Jeez.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's such a good game that we all wanted to play and share it with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you would really like it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to fucking sleep in for once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we also knew that we would probably win because you don't know how to play.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket attacks him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay great. And what's the damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This has never happened before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, he doesn't do this very often.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He critted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did. Ah! Okay, so 2d4 plus nine. Because it's a claw attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Where's my other-- there it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's fucking mysterious music. Have the people change it to some sort of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh sorry, change the music again please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Switch tracks, my friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it like the ghost piano at the Magic Castle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa, 23. Trinket putting out some damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean that's pretty great, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should have had him do that before me, I could have gotten sneak attack damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, seriously. Okay so, as Trinket attacks and takes a vicious chunk out of the side of this hell hound right--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With his claws!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear a growl even further into the cavern.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far does this go? Oh look, isn't that clever!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh it's boobies. I thought it was an anus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's tits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was an anus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's just the shape of the cavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, these are caverns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caverns.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you smoking? And you see from behind the fountain coming another hell hound to see what the cry of its fallen brethren are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a run at the first one and I'm going to throw my spear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to throw your spear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The spear that you picked up at the tavern?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am. I pick up that tavern spear and I'm going to throw it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, now the other ones as well, I need you to roll initiative again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay we're doing it again, let's roll one of these little balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16 yet again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21. Vax, you, back near the tip, are up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I click my boots. Do I have my boots?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you normally have your boots?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck yeah! I click the boots, and I bolt through, out the end of the penis and to the boobs, or the egg, or whatever it is. I go from the tunnel--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the hallway into the cavern. The first round cavern that is identical to the next one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You come into the cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Painful stuff. Yeah, I'd like to run around between my sister and Trinket and get up into the grill of that first spiky dog, because I should have a better chance of hitting it because it's so preoccupied with my sister.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Move your little character wherever you'd like to go, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez. So I jump over here. So I bang like that, I can jump over Grog, and I go (whoop), right up in the middle like that. And then I stab.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You stab. Roll to attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to roll twice. Because I'm feeling good. Ooh, that's good. 30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it does. Okay. So I roll this pointy one that's like a caltrop, and that's a two. And then I add eight to that, that's a ten. And then I roll again for psychic damage. That's 12. Look at all these in a box, oh my God, look at that. 14, eight, no. 25. 29. 32. 32, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With that first dagger, you sink it into the side of the hell hound, and you hear a (pained squeal), and he recoils from the pain, and all of a sudden, his flesh and fur just turns into flame, and he catches fire and burns into nothing. He just absolutely disintegrates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that hurt Trinket standing right next to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it doesn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then we all only get one attack per turn, is that right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, don't you have more attacks? Normally I see you do a lot of shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five more, seven more attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about one more attack? Sounds good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One more attack is good. It might be more, but we'll just do one more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a really cool dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 31.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. On that one, I'm throwing it, so that's not as crazy because I kind of blew my wad on the first one. That's a nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A nine?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket did more damage than that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bear did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much did he do total?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were you here when I did, like, 30-something on the attack just before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is not a competition. You hit it, and it totally gets its attention. It sinks right into its shoulder blade, and it's (pained growling), and focuses on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It focuses on me, but it was talking to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true, yeah. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to step forward and call to the beast. "Beast, look in my eyes and follow my "commands!" And I will cast Dominate Monster on the beast. He has to roll a wisdom save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You must face Bavmorda.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20. It fails. You dominate the monster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I command you, beast, to attack this bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Relentless attack!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't get to do this in real life, so I thought I'd experiment with different things in fantasy land.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Asshole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Must make a DC 12 dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who all is in that cone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll a dexterity saving throw, Vex, Vax, and Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex, Vax, and Trinket? Oh. Oh, my boots are on, so I do better at that now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, not bad for me. 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21 for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You both succeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, though, is a four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A four?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not very dexterous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Trinket takes 29 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what does he look like? Set the scene for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys both take 19 points of fire damage. Halved, because you made the save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, 19 is half of what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of 29? That tracks for Grog, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But what am I subtracting that from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your health.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What health?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much health do you have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Call it 14 points. We'll call it 14 points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The BM is always right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, what do I subtract it from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From your hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are hit points?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your hit points are your hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that over here somewhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I would hope so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can read, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I can. Doesn't mean I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, this noob is bringing the whole table down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, it's terrible. I mean seriously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That says my name, Vax'ildan--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. There.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I bet I have the most in the group. So I take away, I think you said 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeez, Trinket's pretty close to dying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've really been excited about the spear so I'm going to run forward and throw my spear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, what's your speed? How far can you move?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can move 30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30? One, two, three--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five, six...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So unfortunately, Trinket stands between you and the hell hound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I was going to angle out my little walk a bit to the outskirts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Out this way more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, out that way more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so maybe over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there. Yeah, like there. And I think I can throw it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to throw it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, like a javelin, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, roll an attack at disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why disadvantage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is my attack with the spear?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, that's really low. Roll high, darling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A seven then, if it's plus two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, good. You throw the spear and it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits Trinket!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It just disappears. You're not quite sure where but you hear a sploosh. You hear the splash as it seems to disappear into the fountain behind the hell hound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, fine then. I'm going to just sit there and be disappointed then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good, nice. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have a bonus action if you want it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. What can I do with a bonus action? Can I just do whatever I like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen you burn grits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I just assume you'll know that better than me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I let you cook, this is your mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And my grits are best burnt. Makes them a little crispy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice, roll an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That's good. 28.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So he's going to do this. Ten for him. Does he get my Hunter's Mark as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Just checking. And then I'm going to shoot an arrow while he's doing that so the creature's distracted, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why do you decide for Trinket what Trinket does?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, he's not at the table playing right now, so I have to say what he's going to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's right behind me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he's asleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sorry. He blends into the furniture.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's true, all my furniture is bearskin furniture.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's super insensitive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But only since you met Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got 31.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 31 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, 31 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, to hit. It hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even clean it, it's just bloody bear skin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're terrible. 16, 17. Where are they?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just make it up, this is imagination.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you lacking die?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How is that possible?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what did I say I was at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with that you hit the hell hound and the arrow sinks in and he too starts to catch fire from the wound and he's like (howling), and he just evaporates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I killed it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at that. That's brilliant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's dead. Trinket and I killed it! Good job, darling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Not that's it's a competition, but you've killed something, Trinket's killed something, and you've killed something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any points?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I get any points? Did I get any XP?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There were only 450 to give out for the entire game, so it's all been used.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You still have another 200 to give.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is 200 more to give. You'll get 50 XP.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can only juggle so many, you know, parrots at one time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So how it works is you have to get all the XP at the very beginning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, the XB.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The XB; what does the B stand for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boints. Xylophone bears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the hell hounds have been destroyed and the cavern is again quiet. What would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to run my hands through the fountain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. So you go up to the fountain--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like to go to the other fountain and do the same.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can go to this one, yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just so we can do this. In the fountain water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gently first, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's just water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh good. Okay. So I'm going to wash my hands off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you notice as you're washing your hands off right, it's a very nice color, Grog wanders off--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the fountains get any harder?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No they don't. Just nice and yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it hard water or soft water I think is what he's asking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a good question. Would you like to roll an intelligence check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to roll an intelligence check on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which fountain are you inspecting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm inspecting Scanlan's fountain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, you come over to Scanlan's fountain and you're inspecting that one as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you should taste it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up. That's-- no, he really shouldn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. Is this investigation?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Intelligence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Intelligence? All right, then that's a 24.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's very nice, yeah. It's good for your skin, there's vitamins in there, there's potassium and mercury and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any dessert? Do you have servants making any dessert?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In this or in the game?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In here, in the mansion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the mansion. Sure, yes. We have some desserts. Trying to think of vegan desserts. Not flan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, you can make a very nice vegan creme brulee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorbet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorbet is right. It's just fruit and sugar, right? All right. Five...six? Five. We're five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Well, six because we might have extra. Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five pomegranate sorbets please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeds in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So as you're inspecting the fountains, you notice that Grog, having watched you guys be very careful checking for traps and everything is doing the same, he's trying to do his part. Yeah, and lo and behold he finds an edge in the wall just like you found before and he pushes it open and inside there is 20 platinum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 platinum?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. "Guys! I found 20 platinum in this secret passage."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Can I see some platinum too? Can I go over there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Platinum's mine, but you never know what else is around. Maybe look for yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look for other secret doors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Investigation check!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 25.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25? Yeah, in fact on the exact opposite side of the cavern you find a similar door and do you want to push it open?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. So you push and there seems to be something coiled up on the ground in the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a monster or is it platinum?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not a creature or anything. Do you want it or not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like platinum?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Can I look at it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Roll a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a big pile of poop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You found a poo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I search the bottom of each nipple?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Each what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a fountain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to search the bottom of each fountain?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like feel around, see if there's any loot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one would you like to start on? Scanlan's or--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well there's one right behind me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should do the one closest to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to see if there's any traps in there if I'm going to stick my hand deep into that thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, roll an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course. Oh, that's really good. I'm getting the hang of this. That is a 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bottom of the fountain you find-- it's like a mossy bottom and there's some pebbles, but it seems like that might've come from the stones overhead, but there doesn't appear to be any objects in the bottom of the fountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that door on the far end?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go investigate that door over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who does?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll go over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going to join him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There goes Trinket. So you see before you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going to bite Scanlan's shoulder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll to attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love how automatic that was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's not my attack, it's Trinket's attack. 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19. What's your AC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh. Roll for damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is what you get, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bear sinks its teeth into your shoulder and gives you a little jiggle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, bear saliva.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he doesn't brush his teeth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ow! Ouch! Why would you do that, Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (bear growling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very impressive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got breath worse than a decrepit old dachshund, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I should retaliate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think you should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that might piss off Vex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might. There is also this incredible door in front of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which really just adds more bacteria to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspect the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five. You see before you a door, magnificent, brilliantly ornate. It's made of several different kinds of wood and iron. You know everything about this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I open it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you open it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a handle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, there is, there is a latch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is game of fantasy and imagination, so it's just going to open and not hurt us at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll open the latch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The door opens. It just opens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What madness is this?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a utopia!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The door swings open. You notice as it opens there's a carving in the wood of a large tower. As it swings open, it reveals in front of it a small structure about 30 to 50 feet out in front of you and darkness beyond.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing happened when we opened the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you sure you're doing it right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, shockingly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was outside of the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As Scanlan and Trinket are looking through the doorway, they see a structure about 30 to 50 feet away from the doorway. Further into another space is just darkness beyond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My own bathroom door in Whitestone hits me for one point of bludgeoning damage every time I use it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's designed for that; it's a door!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This door is faulty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go through it. I want to walk towards the structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You go through the doorway?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going through the doorway first with Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would everyone like to go through the doorway?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to watch everyone else go through the doorway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to stay behind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go through once they've started to go through. I'm going to make sure everything's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who goes first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need everyone to make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even if we didn't say we were going towards the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I knew it was too good to be true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's see what Trinket rolls. That's cocked. Trinket rolled 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18? Okay. Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax'ildan rolled a 30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30. Everyone except for Vax and Percy are immediately pulled through the threshold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Grog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Freddie. Up top!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a seven. Grog also pulled through the doorway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right, we didn't go through the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax and Percy manage to cling to the side of the threshold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking dummies, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why you never trust a door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You still feel this force pulling you, like there's been an atmospheric pull through the doorway. You hear, on the other side, your comrades getting up, seemingly fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a nice journey that was! I really enjoyed that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For you two, on this side of the door, the pull is still incredibly strong. You can try and fight it or you can go through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm curious to hear how this sensation will be narrated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'd like to wait and also to mull over who is this more painful for: you, Vex'ahlia's husband and lover, or me, her oldest friend and twin brother. It's hard to tell. Grog, can you enlighten us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. As you're mulling this over, you get 12 points of force damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's feel this out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was curious what kind of hardware is attaching this door to the wall? Is it standard brass brackets? Triple bracket?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it have a two-way turn? Can you describe this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's almost as if you saw it for yourself with those descriptions. Really quite impressive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you describe me seeing it for myself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's lumber and stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is lumber and stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Iron. Gold inlay on the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's quite nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. And a picture of a tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While he studies the door, I'm studying Percival. Does he look more rugged and good-looking as his hair is blown towards the door, or less?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know right when you slap someone after you've had too much to drink and their face is doing the pull? That's what his face looks like constantly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if you'd said

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, you're the only one still on this side of the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I do a five-count: One, two, three, four, five. And then I just go: Motherfucker! And I grip my own shoulders and dive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. And you go right through the doorway as well. You both fall with a clatter to the floor, and you notice that in front of you is a structure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Pentagon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this? Oh, look at all those carpets. Do they fly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this Heaven?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this Heaven?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're prone, Percy's prone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I can prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me double-check this. I don't think I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you be pwned?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no pwning here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see before you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. I cannot be knocked prone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. You're on your feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just Vax, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also cannot be knocked prone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see before you a brilliant structure in the shape of a circle. It's quite massive. Made of stone. There seems to be some sort of architecture about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we able to see inside, like we are right now, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we don't know that there's carpets in the individual rooms in there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see them, though, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just pretend like you don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are those doors, or are those windows on the side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In fact, you turn around to see the doorway with which you came has disappeared.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we standing on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really mysterious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just you're able to see here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just gonna walk around the five-sided circle and just make sure there's doors on each of its five sides.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They look like they have different symbols on them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. There is, in fact, doors on each one of the faces. One of them appears to be open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is this also permanent marker?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one is open?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It appears that the door on this side is open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one with the star on it. I'd like to go investigate that door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Yes. So, you go over and find this open door. And as you look, there is a symbol above the doorway. It seems to be the symbol of a star. And the door is open. Would you like to investigate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to investigate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, may I use an action to stand up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24. Yes, you may stand up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are facing the wrong way again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That'll be my next action, to turn around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You see before you a wooden and iron door with a handle. And it has been seemingly forced open. Inside, there is a room, and from what you can see from your vantage point, it seems a very comfortable room. You see a rug on the floor, a potted plant on the side, and what seems to be a chest at the end of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No traps that I saw?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll step into the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You step in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seems wise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While no one is looking at me, I will take out a bit of meat and the poison I've never used in the game, it's called Death Blade Poison. I've had it since we ran Pathfinder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna just tuck it into the meat. Just keep it with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no. I think you're supposed to keep what you know and what you don't know separate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mota-gaming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Meka-gaming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meka-gaming. You can't Mega Man-game--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm looking about the room for anything interesting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a potted plant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A nice rug on the floor. An open chest near the back of the room, and it looks like to be just a simple table with chairs on the other wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will look under the rug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Under the rug?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Under the rug?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You pick up the rug?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a little bit, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's floor. Stone floor. A little dusty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. What's that thing at the far side of it? Is that a chest? That's an open chest, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does appear-- Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go look in the open chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. You go and look in the chest. It is an empty chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing's here, someone's been through here already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's been about three minutes, I'd like to use another action to face the same direction as everyone else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll a dexterity check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. The boots have worn off, so I can only roll this ball once. It's not very good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, that's terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In your effort to turn, you slip and you catch yourself, and you face the same way as everyone else. Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay. Can I walk up to the door in front of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Directly in front of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You walk up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take a look at the square, if that's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, you go up to the square.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing in this one, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe there's one in the room with the-- Is that a money symbol?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does appear to be a money symbol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go in the money room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you like to try and open the door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You go to the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't seem to open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it locked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe the symbols correspond to us. The star being me, because I'm the star. Money for you, because you're greedy. The square for Vax, because he's a square.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could be money for me, because I have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I have it now too, darling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is fair, we actually both have it at this point. I'm going to try my door, the square.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe a circle for Percy, because there's a circle on his glasses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy goes and reaches out, tries the handle. Door doesn't seem to open. You do notice, there's not just the handle, there seem to be five inlaid gems above the handle.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Which corner?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "My room."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This corner right here and aim up at the hatch. Is anything happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you aim at it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your shoulders begin to burn ever so slightly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like there's a lock on the hatch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like there's a handle on the hatch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like it opens outward or inward?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going in to investigate my room. One.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. You go in, you walk in and you're facing backwards. You fall down and it seems to be a very normal room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll open the trunk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. You go forward and as you get to the trunk, the mimic opens its mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A pseudopod attacks you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A pseudopod attacks me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You become attached--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the chest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It has you and it does--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mimics are the worst. Just made of promises--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) 16?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It grabs you and it wraps up with its pseudopod and because you're so small, you're now grappled and it covers your mouth so you cannot scream.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nor cast a spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless I have a spell that does not need a vocal thing. Let me just check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also grappled, I don't know if you can actually move your hands either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are grappled for the moment, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Carry on--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'll do all the same shit. I want to, before I check for traps at the door, perception check for anything--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, don't be so excited about it. It's a unique room. You don't know what adventures lie inside! So roll an investigation check. See what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why'd I roll two? I don't know why I rolled two. I'll take the lower of them. 23.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your arm falls off. It just falls off behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not understand this game, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you come in the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeepers creepers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You come in. The room does not appear to be trapped. You do sense movement somewhere in the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I know what direction I sense the movement from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in front of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In front of me? Is it the rug or the chest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm. What is this thing moving? Sam, wiggle your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the movement? It's there. So I go over to this desk and open it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. As you do, the Rug of Smothering--

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: --with its false appearance grapples you from behind and will attempt to smother you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does it have to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out, did Travis find these things and put them in the room or did he think, what can I put in a room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just went to the Monster Manual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go through the Monster Manual and be like, ooh, a rug! And put that in there. What else can I put in a room... ooh! A plant!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is a 21 to hit and you take-- that does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I believe so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take 11 points of bludgeoning damage and you are restrained, blinded and at risk of suffocating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to die from a rug!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You cannot gesture, make a sound or anything in your tiny little room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're getting murdered by the touring company of Aladdin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I hear any of this? Is there anything--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are in solid stone rooms. You are at risk of suffocating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (muffled) Can I say Jenga? Jenga!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can't reach your earring, so nobody can hear you saying it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we didn't-- we have to do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we have to touch our earring in order to-- it's kind of the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got to tickle your earlobe when you talk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use a game to experience death. It will be enlightening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, you never know when it might come for you out here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything else? Is there anything in the ceiling? Is there anything on the floor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A plate metal hatch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back up to the same corner that Vex is in and I'm going to take a couple shots at the hatch, see what happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You back up. Roll to-- no, fuck that. It's a hatch. You fire. How many shots would you like to fire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three in quick succession.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliant. You fire off three quick shots-- no need to roll-- they all ricochet off of this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two of them crit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. All right. That makes a difference.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does! I just rolled six times and four times have been critical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A small piece of the hatch is now showing some visible line of sight between it and the ceiling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm starting to open this hatch which is in my room. Can everybody hear me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we hear him? Can I hear him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can hear him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can hear you, darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I can't talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can hear you, darling. What's up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I've got a hatch in my room and I've got it a bit open at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a hatch too!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wonder if there's five hatches?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, Vax, look up. Do you see a hatch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be rude. That's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dicks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So rude.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not going to mega-game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I come in your room and look at your hatch, or should I continue to look at my hatch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mega Man is for cowards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My hatch is a bit-- Have you loosened your hatch yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me give it a try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While you're talking, the mimic in Scanlan's room will again try to smother you with a bite attack while it's grappling you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's the music?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Servants, come on, now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They got so tired.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Union break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, you're breaking the verisimilitude.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There it is. The back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage, that is 24 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you doing right now, Scanlan? Not that I know. I shouldn't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are you at?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a yummy sound?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, your rug of smothering also begins to crush you again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is not my first time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Being smothered by a rug?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Having my breathing snuffed out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, before this happens, roll a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use another luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's your last one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not. It's my third one, a-hole. I have four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's enough. You break free, and the rug starts to shimmy down across your legs. It's not smothering you anymore, but it's still keeping you in place. Your arms are free, and you can breathe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The most important thing to me right now is to point out that my strength is 14, which is slightly above average, which is very different than your shit-ass seven, with a modifier of negative two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While it is around your legs, it will bite you for 21 points of damage. Not bite you, crush you. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it roll to hit, or do I make a dex save?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's still grappling you, so you're in the same place, still, but you can breathe and you can move, but it's still around your legs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did I just roll to do, though, Grog? I don't understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you could breathe and not suffocate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's very important. Is it important for me, though? I haven't breathed very much at all--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You, technically? No. Not important for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would have been fine in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But your singing career would have been limited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I take a bunch of damage, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21 points of damage, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you are now free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I have 69 hit points. Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I fly up and look at the hatch up close?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. You take out the broom, you fly up to the hatch--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, can Trinket come in the room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Trinket comes in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to stand in the other corner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are the hatches bars?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plate metal. A square piece of plate metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What can I see up close? Anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is a plate metal hatch. A sheet of metal with rivets, and it's solid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I push on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You cannot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get my fingers in and pull on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I stick a dagger in at the edges and try to pry it open?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. You could try, and I could make you roll a bunch of times. It wouldn't work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he rolled two criticals, and something happened. What if I roll a critical?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll a dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, so close. It was a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You pull on it, and you hear (metal creaking).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a witch behind it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got mine kind of open, if you want to come here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, roll a strength saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13? That's actually exactly what you needed. You manage to get your arms free, and you break free of the mimic, but it is still coming at you. Now you see teeth coming out of this chest, a giant pseudopod tongue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I escape, or should I kill it? I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will step back, and I will Lightning Bolt it at level five!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What does any of that mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will Lightning Bolt it at level five!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was like you started to say four and said five. It turned into an accent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you said you played GURPS in grade school.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has to make a dex save. I think it's a dex save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. It's probably either 15, or it's my spell DC. If it's my spell DC, I wouldn't have the cone up, so it would be 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, either way, he fails, so he gets 10d6 of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of lightning damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sounds like a lot of something, of something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many is that? That's nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These scarves were a wonderful purchase for the group. They are so cozy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So warm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need them in Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 39. Oh! And one more. 43.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With that one lightning, you see the mimic shake, tense up, quake, and burst apart into purple goo. It splatters little green noodles all over the floor where it was, and you see in its muck a little vial where it was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I inspect the vial.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a greater healing potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I chug it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you chug it. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that, four something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone, all the rooms have horrible creatures in them! Be careful!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mine didn't have any creatures in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine had a mildly irritated house plant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck the lot of you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it? Not "help?" While he's healing, Vax, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My hands are free? I throw Whisper 15 feet out the door and bamf to where it strikes on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. You pop outside the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and then I will turn now-- it's up to you, Grog--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unleash Armageddon. Do what you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use two daggers, if I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now's the time, mate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. I'm going to use my Vow of Enmity on the rug, and then I'm going to attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to cut a rug, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get 150 XP.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 150 XP for the terrible pun. Huzzah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many do you have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have zero points!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am susceptible to puns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is good to know, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (giggles) 31, and because my Vow of Enmity on this rug is in fucking effect, I get sneak attack damage, so that is two, plus eight is ten, and then we add some of that. 12, and these guys go, as well. (counting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't know you're there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. It's a rug.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 39 points of damage on the fucking Persian carpet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with that, the rug quakes and falls flat, deflated. A regular rug now. Slightly unraveled at the corners.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck you. And I'm going to walk in and check out that chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. You hear, all of a sudden, as you check out the chest-- indeed, there is a greater healing potion. As Vax terminates the rug, you hear a click in all of the latches above your heads.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Am I still up at the latch? Am I still right at the latch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I said I was. I never stopped being there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. There you are, just flying right next to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take another shot at mine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fire, and the latch flips open at the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I push on mine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No response. You may push on yours. It lifts. It comes right back down, but lifts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My latch is open. My hatch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, Vax?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems like mine's open, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to activate my spider boots and head on up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent. You walk up the side of the wall, doing the little shimmy that Percy does so well in his bedroom when he's getting dressed in Whitestone. He pops through the hatch. Do you go up, as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do. I bamf Trinket into my necklace, first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trinket goes in the necklace. You go up through the hatch. What about you two fellows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to turn into a dung beetle and fly straight up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, yeah. Into this tiny little dung beetle, you fly. You hit the hatch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's solid?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a click. It didn't fucking open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought it had bars.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (popping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought it had bars!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take five points of stupid damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'm back out as a gnome, and I guess I'm falling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you fall a whole ten, 11 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take two points of gnome damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, what are you doing? Wings? Yeah, the fucking wings come out, even though you're on the ground, and you walk, very badass, back through the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll grab the potion. I will use them to easily hop the 12 feet up, and then I will pull the wings in. Press the wings into the back of me, and slide and crawl my way up this tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliant. You pop up through the hatch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it another room, or is it a tunnel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll shortly see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My wings are silky smooth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, what are you doing? You come to, and you're like, "Fuck. Why did I turn into a dung "beetle? The latch was still closed."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Now I will turn into a monkey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A monkey. What kind of monkey?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A gibbon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A small gibbon. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Big enough that it has muscles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I crawl up to the top and try to push open the latch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get up there, and as you start to push, roll a strength check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This very large metal latch flies open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shit on the latch and keep going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You pop up through the latch. As Scanlan makes his gibbon way through the latch, all of you find yourself in a new space, and all of the latches slam closed. You find yourself in a new space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, you are so artistic!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't I? It resembles the shape of the previous map.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That resembles the shape of the previous map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a circle, just like the last one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You find yourselves with a flat floor. You have a visual line of sight with all of the members of your team.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can see each other?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can see each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except for one. Who would have been the star?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's some sort of body laying above the area of the room with the door that was already open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to examine it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are there walls separating us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are on what seems to be the roof of the room previous, and there's a giant tower right in the middle of all of this. At the top of this tower, not to size, there's a large platform dome area up here with light radiating out of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, from my point of view, I can see Fletcher's Mill emblazoned at the base of the tower. I just imagined it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that Sharpie at the bottom of that pepper mill?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he ruin your designer pepper mill?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis Willingham!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you see your comrades up atop the roof of this platform and some sort of corpse or motionless body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we walk over to it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to walk over to it and kick it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You start to walk over, and as you reach this border, you are struck by an invisible field, and you take eight points of force damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, eight points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wanted to pickpocket Scanlan so I could start Robbing Gibbons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you hit the wall, there is a shimmer of energy that quickly dissipates in between your section and someone else's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it gone now, or is it still there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It shimmers and disappears.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably still there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to try stepping up the column.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you move towards the column, you see on this tower, it is made of stone, but there seem to be built-in footholds and handholds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I ignore them. I'm not going to put my hands or feet in any of those holes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are struck with horror as form begins to take shape in front of each of you. Behind Percy, all of a sudden, the form of a mind flayer begins to take shape. Behind Vax, a red-skinned, armor-clad, winged demon appears. A cambion, right in front of our rogue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You looked these up last night, you had to look these up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In front of Vex, a pony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, a pony, yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't touch it, it's evil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A giant roar echoes across the land.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over a gibbon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have been waiting for gibbon versus T-rex my entire life!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A T-rex versus a gibbon. You all stare in horror at perfectly picked enemies for you. I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled one. 20, 20, one, my last three rolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 23, that's the Percy I know. Vex?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A big 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That potion was 4d4?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did 4d4 plus four, is that right for a greater healing potion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. The cambion turns and faces Vax at the top of the initiative, and he will unleash his Fire Ray at you. 26 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is hard. You take 12 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to pretend like the Deathwalker's Ward is set to fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So halve that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So six, nice. And he will make a ranged spear attack against you. It's only 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does not hit. Sidestep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The deer shoots-- The deer? The deer bounds past-- The spear misses you, as you are presented with this new foe, and with a bonus action he will take flight. But I'm not breaking out those fucking stands, so let's just say he takes flight. Next in the initiative order, this pony takes a few steps towards you and (snorting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't attack me, pony!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A large, celestial, lawfully good enemy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to have to kill it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm not going to, it's so cute!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to murder and eat our opponents, it's the only way out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it will cast Entangle on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I have to roll to avoid it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have to make a DC 18. It is a dex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You feel all of a sudden these vines come out of the stonework and it holds you where you are. And it will charge straight at you using its magical horn. 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It hits. But I have uncanny dodge and evade, which one do I use?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evasion for a dex save, uncanny dodge can halve one melee attack per round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does 12 points of piercing damage and I need to you roll a strength saving throw or be knocked prone by its mystical power.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A strength saving throw? If I use evasion does it still have to do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evasion only triggers if you have to make a dex save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so fucking close. 25.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not knocked prone, you sidestep it, but you only take the damage. Percy, you are up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to throw Manners at this creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a JRPG, you're throwing mana?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Manners, not mana. Let's see, that's a ranged attack roll, that's 30 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That will hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My target is restrained. On its turn, it can make a DC 20 strength check to try and get out. At the moment, it's restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A natural one, he is restrained.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And since he's restrained I think I get a bonus on that, don't I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're so nasty. Melee attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not waste bullets on anything like this. I'll take three swipes. Is it an auto-crit if they're restrained?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. No, you have advantage, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have advantage, okay. So I'll go with that. I don't actually remember.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I overheard the guy at the tavern right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's one normal hit. 25 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. He has a very low AC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the last one is 24 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All three hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to breathe deep. I may use my bonus action to take a healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please do. All right, next up: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me! Are my hands restrained or is it just my feet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just your feet, you cannot move. Let me check, because I'm sure I'm getting this totally right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you checking, Grog? Do you have a book or something for this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I carve notes into the thingy. Yeah, you just can't move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't move my feet? Okay. I'm going to cast Grasping Vine. And I'm going to try to hook a vine around the unicorn and pull him back towards the corner right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you killed him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He dies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is top heavy. Let's go with option number two. None of these guys want to stay up! You're so drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go home, unicorn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unicorn will use one of his legendary--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got legendary actions?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, and he resists the Grasping Vine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a fucking dick!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, unicorns, right? Fuck me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think he can resist it, but whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you a unicorn? Then how do you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not like it's a spell effect, he has to make a dexterity save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you arguing with the BM?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope, not at all. Can I shoot him? No, I don't want to shoot him! Can I talk to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to say: Unicorn, why are you attacking me? I don't want to fight you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What language are you speaking in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm speaking in Unicorn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You already cast Speak With Animals today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Celestial for unicorn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm speaking in Unicorn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And your six seconds are up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not a language.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, how do you know it's not a language?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know these things. It's what I do. I drink and I know things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then I'm going to speak in normal, and I'm speaking Elvish! I feel like unicorns might be able to understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, the unicorn speaks Celestial, Elvish, Sylvan, and telepathy, but because you just spoke in Common--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said Elvish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good thing it understands you-- It has telepathy!

lines.name: LAURA
