lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he's like, "I am a unicorn. There can only be one." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my whole turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that was like 87 seconds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The T-rex will take its turn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bring it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is going to run towards you with a multi-attack on your carrion form. It's going to make a bite attack first. That is an 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Oh god. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So much math.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 36 points of damage. Does that knock you out of your carrion form?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, I'm no longer a monkey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a bite, so you are in the jaws of a T-rex, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (squawks) I don't think they make that noise, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so. It sounded kind of like a bird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are very bird-like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we are going to make a tail attack against you. Oh, it's only 18 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Scanlan has an AC of 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? That's so low.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 28 points of damage as it smacks you with its tail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you doing, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still double digits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Next up: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It has to make a dex save versus my DC of 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You really caught on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poof! Lit up like a disco ball, and I now have advantage on the attack against it so I can fucking sneak attack, which is going to be clutch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. It stands there, not thinking much of you and a burst of fiery light surrounds his form. All of a sudden, you are very sure about where to hit and how.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right in front of me, and I will use my bonus action to throw a fucking dagger. Oh dear, that is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it does, and it gets (counting), plus these guys. Jeez, that was a shitty roll. 33 and I'm going to dump my other level two spell slot for Divine Smite. 48 total from Whisper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. Sam. Scan! Lan. You're up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muttering) Challenge rating. Am I in its--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it smacked you with its tail away. It bit you, and then it was like (spits out), and hit you with its ass extension.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm contractually required to turn into a triceratops.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, have you done that before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. I should have that, but I didn't plan that far ahead. So we're going to turn you into this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This unicorn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, before I did that, I Healing Worded myself for like ten points of health there, as a bonus. And now I am a triceratops and I will use the rest of my turn to back into the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, that's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, the cambion is up and he's going to multi-attack against you. 16 will miss. 24?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does not hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. He has one last-- 25.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, you only get hit once though, which is nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's it hit me with?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He hits you with this fiery spear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 16 points of fire and piercing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire, so that'll be halved to eight? And then it might be four, I'm going to look something up really fucking quick. Uncanny dodge. I'm going to halve that down to four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliant. He's going to use his movement to-- Just right in your face! "Look how big my wings are in comparison to yours!" It is now the unicorn's turn. The unicorn rushes forward--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you ever seen this unicorn before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I have no idea--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is going to make two hooved attacks against you and a horn stabby in your face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Friendship is magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true. 16?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the horn. That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because it's 27. That is 19 points of piercing and bludgeoning damage, respectively.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could be worse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he will stay where he is. He will try to stand up again. For the brave-- (gasps) He's a show pony. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually should be right in the face of this terrible--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes, sorry. You did stabby the fuck out of him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to keep stabby, stabby, stabby. With advantage. So, stabby. Yes, that hits. Stabby. Ooh, that's nice. That's crit-- Oh, it's not crit because it's not a gun, it's just a sword. And that's really hard to read, because that's Scanlan's dice. My lowest number is 28 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They all hit, very hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is really pretty though, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The triceratops diddles his iPhone in the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking up all my stats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 36 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't been a triceratops in over a year.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he still just doing that, just there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. He looks like he is quite surprised as to why he's there in the first fucking place, and that you are--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to add a little bit of extra damage on there with my Hex. So let's just add five points of lightning damage as well, for fun. 14 points of lightning damage on top of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He will react to that extra salvo, (snarls) with all his stupid things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Try and mental me or anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is going to use Mind Blast right at you. I need you to roll an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wasn't it you that he tried to suck the brain out of before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Intelligence saving throw, that's 23.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good deal. He is going to make a simple melee attack against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, he's not. He's restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, he's restrained. He's just, like, baffled by how dominant you are in this whole thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to keep stabbing him in the face over and over again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he really wishes he wasn't here right now. He's not sure who he pissed off. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Am I still entangled?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Saving throw? That would be 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You break free of the vines and they wither and die in the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to use the Grasping Vine again and try to wrap right around his leg and yank him back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. I roll, don't I? What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a dex save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, then he's restrained. Or he's pulled back at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's pulled back on his heinies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! So it falls over, it's all right. And then I'm going to cast Speak with Animals, although I don't need to because he already--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Speaks more languages than you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to say: You're a very good creature. I know you're lawful. What are you doing fighting me? I'm good too!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (hums)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything? No response?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, on his turn he might.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, just know that I don't want to attack you, I'd rather just ride around on you, because you seem really beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more time, just not trying to kill you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then for my movement, I'm going to hop on my broom and fly up in the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not quite to the top of the tower. How high does the tower go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looks like it's 120 feet to the top of the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just go up 40 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good. At 40 feet you are hovering up at the top of the tower, and you hear somewhere above you a buzz of energy. I don't know how many this is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, you have them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well they're over here, so fuck it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, maybe flip it over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got it wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's this shit work? What was wrong with the first way I was doing this? Here, you're flying 40 feet in the air. Sam, make that work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are missing a piece.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, here, there's a base over here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There you go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure there's a certain number of things you've got to count, but-- That's really high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah (counting). I'm about ten feet higher than I should be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear a buzz of energy above you, but you seem to be fine. Scanlan. No, Vax. No, T-rex! T-rex charges forward towards the triceratops, nurturing its ancient rivalry with such a foe. It will make a multi-attack. It will bitch slap you with its tail. 25.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For 23 points of bludgeoning damage. And it will make a bite attack against you. 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 4d12 plus seven. I suck at subtraction math. Adding, I'm okay. That is 37 points--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good. Oh, you're a triceratops, you're all sorts of muscled up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Vax, it is your turn. He's just going to be like (grunts).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it has to save versus a 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you go to cast Faerie Fire, you see it disperse along the barrier wall between your section and his. Unaffected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought that would affect physical, not magical. All right, well then I will fuck this guy up in front of me then. That's a 23?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19, that's good. 36 total. And I'll just stick it out right in front of him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's looking very rough. Scanlan, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Without leaving his attack range, and thus not provoking an attack of opportunity I hope, I'm going to charge for his leg and hit it with a gore attack. So I'm going to move down the line and attack his leg. Rolling a two. Plus nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A two! The triceratops runs forward. No effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: End of turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) That's what the triceratops has got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was Sam as Scanlan as Scanlan as T-rex as bear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, the cambion getting its ass handed to it by Vax will look him in the face, and it will cast Command at-- let's say fourth level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, to fly into the wall over and over again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need to roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight-- 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15, not good. He commands you to grovel in front of him, and all of a sudden you feel this overwhelming urge. You drop to your knees and you lay prone right in front of him, not able to get up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't understand this game! The rules don't make sense! Can I have some XBs, please? Can I have some XBs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. What a good idea, to grovel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 39 points of piercing and fire damage, which is halved.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But which part of it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just give me a number, Grog. You're the mathematician.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's call it 20, down to 20. Let's call it 19 points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I would've got back a hit point, because I'm a revenant. So that's 41, so I'm sitting pretty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good deal. There you are. Next up is the unicorn. Having heard your humanitarian pleas for peace--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's also stuck in that position because of the Grasping Vine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Casts Levitate. Kidding, he doesn't have Levitate. Why did I move him? He's there. The unicorn who's stuck, which I totally forgot about, will use... Ooh! Yes! Teleport! He casts Teleport.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where? Where does he go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once a day he magically teleports himself within five feet of where he was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Within five feet of where he was?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Poof! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, five feet Teleport? What spell is that?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It will use its horn of rainbow attack against you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, it fucking hits me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 22 points of damage. That ends its turn. Percy, you are up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to stab him three more times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do need to make a dexterity save to see if I stay on my broom?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. You take it like a champ.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three more attacks. That's 21 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits. If those two hit, just roll damage for those two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They all hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's looking pretty gross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's terrible. 28 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the sword, right? As you take your silvered sword and repeatedly jam it into his general thorax and face, repeatedly-- Tentacles falling off like freshly cut sushi, he just falls backwards, guts spewing like Stephen King's The Thing. He is toast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Clarota) Go fuck yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For my bonus action I'm going to retract my little Manners ball, and then I'm going to walk, and attempt to tap the wall to see if it's still standing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you walk to the wall, you notice that there seems to be no force field on your side of the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually in the far corner, put me behind the unicorn, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you tapped this one. I got you. You seem to see no effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, good. That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to take the greater healing potion. Which is 4d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You better attack this fucking unicorn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that's a really good 14 points plus four, right? So 18 points healed. And then I'm going to fly over the unicorn, and drop down, landing on its back! And I'm going to use my Rope of Entanglement to make like a harness thing and hold on to the fucking unicorn like a fucking rodeo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why aren't you killing the unicorn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's lawful good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need you to make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That would be a one. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please tell me she falls on the horn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is everything I've ever wanted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You plummet, falling toward its head. And at the last moment, having been affected by your wonderful message, it looks up. And you find yourself impaled, gored on its horn! It even jumps up and spins!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Free Willy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I deserve that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You will take, jeez, 18 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right back down to where I was before I healed. But thank god I healed!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just manage to roll off the horn, laying on your back across its mane. Not riding it, but just there for the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I on my back or on my stomach?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're on your back, in a very uncomfortable arched position. The T-rex turns! Tail whip!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screech)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 26 points of bludgeoning damage, and the bite attack against you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you have to roll to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, fuck. Oh, 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, that is 39 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, back to Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah? Vax, you are prone and up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use half my movement to stand. And then I will use the other half of my movement, which winged is 30 feet, and fly up to this asshole. And I will use a bonus action to down that potion that I grabbed, which is 4d4 plus four. So that's (counting) 14. And then I will stab this asshole in the asshole. That is a 33 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An asshole for an asshole. That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, here we go. (counting) And then here come all the d6s.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) 44, and I will dump--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're very good at adding all those dice for someone who's never played this game before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good at math, I'm not good at whatever the fuck this game is. This is the best game, though. So it's in the high 40s, you made me lose track. I'm going to say 49.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it. Oh god. Any other attacks after that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Not much. That is 26 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven, and I will dump my last spell slot in. 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with that, the dagger pierces through the armor. And you hear (snarls) as a spurt of black blood comes out of its mouth. Its wings fall to the side. And it's like, "How did you..." And falls over dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slow dance down to the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Meanwhile, me and Laura still haven't dealt any damage to ours at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a Tyrannosaurus rex and a unicorn that still need to be dealt with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put Scanlan back on there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah! Where is Scanlan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very quickly, covered in gore, Freddie and Vax nod.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite proper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has to make a dexterity saving throw against 22. But he's dexterous, it could work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it hurt him to hit the top?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. In fact, you see ripples of energy just going out. And you start to smell fried alligator. He falls 50 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings Jurassic Park theme)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25. Damn it, he's barely-- (groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He would actually technically not fall. He just stays there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh really? So each round he'll take more of that energy damage. Fair enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He stays there for a minute. So that's ten rounds of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The unicorn, feeling this upside-down half-elf on his back, shakes you off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Can I try to hang on? I want to try to hang on to his hair!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Roll an athletics check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't need to roll the other one, because it's a one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, am I getting eaten by the unicorn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The unicorn comes over, and begins to smell the fallen half-elf. "You showed me great "respect, Vex'ahlia. Your kindness will live throughout the ages. All the unicorns will be told "of your mercy." And it kneels down and touches its horn to the ground, and all of the enemies disappear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well earned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you! It worked!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You also see a similar shimmer disappear from the barriers, and you can see the stones on the tower even more clearly than ever before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do they look like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like stones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on myself at 3rd-level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go take a look at that body that was sitting in the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Percy, you get over, and you see what seems to be some sort of humanoid figure. Roll a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not great. 14.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's also bits of hair, multicolored, and big gashes in the floor. There's tons of gore, but it does appear as if whatever this was was mauled by something, almost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big is this body, approximately?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very close to your own. Very similar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any clothing that we recognize?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, take a look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll come look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My wounds are starting to heal up somewhat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because they do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You come over and you're like, those are fucking clothes. Old brigade navy and, you know, all sorts of stuff that you kind of recognize but not really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I bamf Trinket out and see if he recognizes the scent?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you bamf Trinket out of the necklace, and he's like, whoa, unicorn piss! And he goes right back in the necklace because I don't know where he went-- There he is. He's out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he smell for perception on the body to see if he recognizes who it is? Yeah, he has smell perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, roll the whatever that is. He's got that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got advantage on smell perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, go for it, advantage style. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that count?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you roll it on purpose?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but it's a natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you've got to roll it on purpose!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspire the bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspire the bear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By feeding it meat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go on, Trinket. Smell real well tonight, Trinket!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trinket takes the meat and just starts gobbling it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will actually inspire the bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. So 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's almost that of an animal, like perhaps another bear, or a wolf even. Some sort of animal scent on the body. Right then, Trinket (groans) and this little hairball covered in mucus comes out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on? SAM I don't know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you flip Trinket over on his back and pat his stomach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like, not in the game but out of the game, to hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, does anyone know CP-bear?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what our dachshund does. Trinket takes 27 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he's dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he's unconscious. I think he goes back into the necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm going to kill Scanlan anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on. So Trinket (groans). Face first, ass up in the air, and goes back into your necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bamf him back out and heal him. I cast Cure Wounds at 3rd-level. What are you doing down on the ground?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hiding because you're going to murder our friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't what's happened to your bear! Something's wrong with him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trinket heals 15 points. Do you leave him out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I leave him out, and I cast Speak with Animals on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you've done that already today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I have another one, you dick! It only lasts ten minutes. And I go: Trinket, what happened?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Well, I had the worst stomachache. I don't know, I ate that meatball from Scanlan and "then I fucking died. I don't want to make any assumptions, but--" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan! Did you kill my bear? Did you kill him? Why would you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who betrayed this grizzly murder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (wheezing) I don't know! I mean, maybe it was something else? Maybe it was the unicorn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to put Scanlan in the necklace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does that shit work? You've got the card, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he has to be willing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deception check? 33.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He really doesn't know. He doesn't know what Trinket's talking about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I don't try to put him in the necklace? But don't I have to roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can beat my deception. You can roll against it, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I can. But you have to roll a DC wisdom save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just roll a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the DC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a 15. But it's minus two! But it's still 13.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls. Well, do I believe him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do believe him. He doesn't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what happened with your bear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He seems quite flummoxed over Trinket's sudden--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just so weird that he got sick right after you gave him food.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, I found that meat back there. Maybe it was poison or something, but I wouldn't know from poison, I'm a simple pauper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I have never seen you feed a single thing to that bear in all the time we've known you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is peculiar, isn't it? The deception was against her, I think you have to roll separately for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was your reasoning for feeding Trinket right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seemed hungry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's always hungry, Scanman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deep humming) A flash of light. Your attention is directed to the top of the tower. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the electric field still up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It seems to have dissipated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm climbing up the tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fly up, put Trinket back in my necklace and fly up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fly up. Spider walk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Climb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Climb. Athletics checks for Percy and Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First, I'm going to bonus Healing Word myself again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A seven. I mean, it's just walking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this an acrobatics check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Athletics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Athletics check. I will inspire myself. Ooh, that's four plus three plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. As Percy is walking up the tower, he trips and falls into the tower and smashes his face and stands back up with his boots. You take eight points of smash-your-face damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I regret nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, you fall after about 15 feet. You take eight points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've essentially undone my heal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all reach the top. It has a very similar-- just ignore that. Whatever. And there in the middle is your friend, Grog. He's like, "Guys! I "knew you would come and find me! I mean, one second we were all in the tavern, and then all of "a sudden it went hazy. You won't believe what I've had to go through. There was a big hallway with a "ghost, and then there were all these monsters."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it's a doppelganger, we have to murder him together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check for sure. Oh, that's terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to join in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four, six, nine, and--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, girl!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so glad-- did you teleport here, or Plane Shifty?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did the same thing what you did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we were just a little behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "You didn't fight your way here, did you? You didn't go through the rooms?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, that whole thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I don't want to fight you." You hear a voice echo from above you as you see a cloaked, levitating figure take form. A female voice shouts out, "I need a hero! I need a hero until the end "of the night! He's got to be strong, he's got to be fast, he's got to be fresh from the fight!" And you see Trish the Dish floating above the platform. Trish, the god of Whitestone, looking down and saying, "I need one of you to be my champion."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how I pictured your mom singing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's pretty close. You should hear her in church: awful. You see now as Grog shakes his head, goes into a rage, and I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we fighting each other or are we just fighting you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just fighting Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stinkaroo. Seven. Rolled a two on the Matt die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You watch as Grog goes into a rage and you see a hesitation. He doesn't want to attack his friends. He looks down at his arm and you see there similar scrapes, cuts, gashes as you saw on the corpse below. He looks up, grins, and lets out a ferocious howl as he transforms into werewolf Grog! Destiny fulfilled! The time has come! He charges forward. He races towards Percy and will make a reckless Great Weapon Master attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is Grog porn if ever there was any.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 27 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man! I really should have healed up more! Shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hit die! Too late.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Minus five. 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 points of damage. That will end Grog's turn. Actually, he'll stay there because he's within melee range. Next up: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me do this. I'm still very reasonable. Let's do a few things. We're right next to each other. You get an attack of opportunity if-- actually, I'm going to use the Cinture of the Stone King to do a shockwave of thunderous energy. I'm going to cast shockwave at level five which is a DC 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that dex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thunderwave, let me find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll look also. Thunderwave. Constitution saving throw. Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, then. Failed save is 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed ten feet away. 2d8 plus five. I hope I'm doing this right. That's 6d8.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I hate the ones that have math.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two, four. Six. And one more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How crazy will it be to go back to just rolling one die?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be the best. The best!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 38 points of damage. And you're pushed ten feet away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I strike for four hit points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm already ten feet away, good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Percy, leave some Grog for the rest of us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I will. There'll be plenty. First shot, I'm going to shoot you in the head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's so casual! Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God fucking damn it. My gun jams and I take five points of psychic damage. So that's funny. My gun jams and I'm going to back off to the right about 30 feet. For my bonus, I'm going to heal a little bit and then that's the end of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to bamf Trinket out and run up to Grog, but he's not going to attack him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trinket's going to run up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's going to run up next to him. I'm going to Hunter's Mark Grog. Then I'm going to shoot him twice. Well, I'm going to shoot him first, hold on, let's see if it hits. 22.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a bramble shot. That's going to be 4d8 of piercing damage plus regular damage! Nine, 17, 19. Plus-- what was that? 19? 19 plus five is 24 plus eight is 32. Plus lightning. 36. Hunter's Mark. 37. Plus sneak attack. 43. 46 damage on the first arrow, and Grog has to make-- like this is going to be really hard for him-- a strength saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, one. One!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You notice as you do all this damage of the physical variety, it's not doing as much damage as you thought it might.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Grog is restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's restrained. A raging werewolf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does a werewolf take? Silver?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And remember, Grog has all damage halved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Fucking hell! Okay. I'm going to shoot him again while he's restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you already use it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30-something. Ten, 12, 15. 15 for the second arrow, and I fly up in the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kick up on the broom and fly up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That high. Sure, why not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job. Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan? What do I do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points do you have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we trying to kill Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe try to get him unconscious or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to kill him to be sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will cast Bigby's Hand at 6th-level, and I will punch Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bigby's Hand comes out. Crunch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bigby's Hand. (muttering) Clenched fist. It's 6d8. I need d8.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's 3d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. It doesn't automatically crit or anything, right? And then I will back away, slowly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you hit Grog with Bigby's Hand, you see the pain ripple through his body, and the wolf form fades, painfully. You see his wounds are all quite evident. He is already quite hurt from his struggles up the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe speak to him in unicorn language.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, you have a silvered sword. End it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shank him, Percy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Wait, you're not really going to do it, are you?! Fuck! I was kidding. Jesus! Oh my god!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought we had an arrangement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Let me get my courage up."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, what is that behind you? I turn, and I run, and I attack him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll to attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26 will hit. It doesn't matter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You find yourselves instantly transported back to the tavern, with Grog's bloodied body on the table, pouring everywhere, and the poor old innkeeper going, "Oh my god! You're going to have to pay for that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He dies, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He dies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quick, what was his son's name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Timothy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Grog dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my last Cure Wounds at 3rd-level and heal him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a half-conscious Pike we could wake up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll heal him for now, and then Pike will really heal him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What has the story taught you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What has the story taught us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much you care and need Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, obviously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it actually taught us that in the end, we have to kill Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we're willing to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And to get while the getting is good. And I would like to shave the other side of Grog's face that I didn't shave that one time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The mystic werewolf powers within him will regrow, even in an unconscious state, any hair that you shave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shave, shave, shave. It keeps growing back!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the sun rises on yet another day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before the sun rises, I cast Wish that Trish has persistent gonorrhea forever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a DC save against persistent gonorrhea?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I do have to roll something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You roll a d20 and I'll roll a d20. Ready? One, two, three. Eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that will bring an end to our game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Wait, because that was the end of Bunions and Flagons. We're still in character.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that game was so fun!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It really was good, right? It's not as good as the long-haired guy in the tavern down the way. If you want to see a real chapter, you should see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you happen to catch this man's name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I didn't. It was something like Bursar or Cathew. I missed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cathew Verser?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cathew Verser.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll look out for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's a champ. But think about what you want to do differently next time that was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Questionable?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, nicely done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think bard gnomes are not that good. I think next time I'm going to be a ranger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we do a sci-fi bent next time? Rifts or Shadowrun or cyberpunk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A do-ron-ron?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A do-ron-ron, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, that was great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was very entertaining.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a little bit tired because that was a three and a half hour game, right in that sweet spot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who won the game, though, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who has the most XP?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have 150 XP.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have 200.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have 300 XP.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a bonus 500 XP to give, but you have to guess my favorite color.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Titties.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ale.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy guessed it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not titties?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know you anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I will be the one to end you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to bed. Good night!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I call a servant over, and I say: Bring him some chicken.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Soy chicken, but at least it's something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Done! Oh god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I missed Percy. That was really fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You find in the distance, the T-rex and the unicorn find each other and start a new magical hybrid race.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the thumbnail image, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that was awful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did very well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That math is impossible, as well as keeping track of that shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a lot!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know how he keeps track of all that stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have anything taped to the screen?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a mess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you plan the next move that you're going to do when every turn is your turn, as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's a big struggle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Stroogle?" It is a "stroogle."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I had a bit too many enemies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had the perfect amount!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It felt good from this end.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, for those that stayed with us, thank you. That would be my first and probably only foray into being a BM master. We would like to thank our sponsor for tonight's episode: Marvel Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to bit.ly/marvelcrit, and make sure that they know that you came from Critical Role.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I won't be here to talk about it, but I'm sure you'll say lovely things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will say lovely things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will watch from Australia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also, we have scarves!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The scarves are the fucking bomb. They're so soft and cozy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're not those one-sided scarves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dual-sided scarves!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, good job with those three of my 400 miniatures, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, man. Thanks. Your miniature collection is to be applauded. I looked at it, and I couldn't see the forest--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How lucky are my eight- and 11-year-old?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So lucky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Love you, baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love you. Thank you, guys, and what's the old signoff? Is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was the worst delivery of that line.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [music]
